author: Indiesoft LLC
description: A ready-to-use tool to develop and build playable ads with Defold.
name: Playable Ads Build Tool

releases.message:
## What's Changed
* Update CI to Java 21 by @aglitchman
* Fix problem with downloading bob by @borodin-vasiliy

## New Contributors
* @borodin-vasiliy made their first contribution in https://github.com/indiesoftby/defold-playable-ads/pull/21

## What's Changed
* Set specific engine version by sha1 by @mozok in https://github.com/indiesoftby/defold-playable-ads/pull/18

Many thanks to @mozok for the first contribution!
This version adds support for Defold 1.8.0.
Quick-fix: Facebook Playable Preview Tool blocks the Gamepad API, so a temporary workaround has been added to the HTML5 template.

## What's Changed

Added support for Unity Ads, updated documentation, updated example to test how the sound is paused in the Unity Ad Tester when the player minimises the app.

This version adds a new `--architectures` parameter that will keep only the specified architectures in the release file. The default architecture is now WASM, since most players have WASM support https://developers.poki.com/player-device-report/
This version adds support for Defold 1.4.8, which requires Java 17. Plus, removed the warning about running the game from local filesystem.

## What's New
* Added a command line argument to exclude WebAssembly files (default is true) - `--exclude-wasm <arg>`.
* Updated UglifyJS to fix issue #9.

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/aglitchman/defold-playable-ads/compare/1.2.3...1.2.4

## What's Changed
* Remove spaces and other characters from filenames to match Bob output by @dri-richard in https://github.com/aglitchman/defold-playable-ads/pull/7

## New Contributors
* @dri-richard made their first contribution in https://github.com/aglitchman/defold-playable-ads/pull/7

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/aglitchman/defold-playable-ads/compare/1.2.2...1.2.3
